title: Can we please get something to prevent immobile champions from being dived so easily?
body: Playing Vel'koz and being repeatedly 3-man dived from full health at level 8 with zero risk is extremely fun.

If you're getting repeatedly 3 men man dove, you're doing something wrong...

Either you're exaggerating, it happens only when your team is really weak everywhere else and you're playing well, which means they're focusing on shutting you down so you can't carry. As much as it sucks, most champions can't carry 4 idiots.

Or you're not really getting 3manned, at least not consistently by level 8. You're dying solo due to disrespecting your Lane opponent, then being seen as free gold and XP for the enemy jungle/support so they're roaming on you and diving because you're already behind. Your Lane opponent could probably 1v1 dive you already, but the others are there for assists and to ensure your jungler doesn't save you.

I.e. either you're playing bad, or you're playing well but your team is playing really bad.

In general vel'koz would be able to clear waves pretty quickly so avoid getting pushed in with minions, so he shouldn't be a target that's super available to be dove. Further he can put out cc and a load of damage with his ultimate if people are starting to run at him. Are you burning your cc before they go for the dive?

It's a CC called grounded, that riot refuses to give out and always attaches it to area slows.

Because god forbid they add it to abilities like slows, which apply debuffs on the champion rather than in the AoE of a skill.

Something more is wrong if you are getting 3-man dived.

Ie, you are ignoring pings, or nobody is pinging, or bot lane fed their asses off at lv3, 4, 5 and 6.
